Hi,
I'm looking to use the HubSpot API for managing companies, deals, and contacts. I would like to perform operations like delete, merge, etc using the HubSpot API's. I have a question related to the private access token. Does the token get expired? Is by default the rotate token option valid?
And if I select the rotate option token, I would need to use to token generated after 7 days?

The expiry period for Private App keys is not stated. It is recommended to Rotate them every 6 months.

If you use the Rotate Token option, the old token will remain valid for 7 days.
You can start using the new token immediately and it will also be valid.

After 7 days, the old token would stop working. The new token would continue to work.
Thank you Harun.
I also have a question regarding OAuth. Is Oauth available for Private apps? For the above operations is good to have oauth or just access token mechanism
hello, i am looking for some API to get data for customer info, contacts, deals info. so how i can get token/auth and API end points for this. please guide me.

If you would be using the HubSpot API to manage companies, deals, contacts for a single HubSpot portal, you can create a Private App and use the Private App key as the Bearer Token on REST API calls or as Access Token with the HubSpot SDKs.
If you need to create an app that will manage companies, deals, contacts for any HubSpot portal that installs it then you will need to create a Public app and authenticate with Oauth.
